item: Fiendish Hypotheses and Protections from Same ( spellbook )
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Demonologist](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3540)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Demonologists can pull a creature from the [Outer Rifts](/Planes.aspx?ID=45) and bend it to their will... for a time.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Demonologist](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3540)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 100

**Perception** +15

**Languages**
[Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +14, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35) +16, [Demon Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +18, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +11, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Demonic Temptation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) Demonic study has garnered the attention of at least one [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=387) who is actively trying to possess the demonologist. When the demonologist publicly espouses the benefits of demonic power (whether they believe it a good thing or not), they gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks, AC, and saves for 1 day. These bonuses don't apply against [demons](/Traits.aspx?ID=573). At the end of the day, the demonologist must attempt a DC 20 Will save, becoming possessed for 1 day on a failure (or permanently on a critical failure).

**Items**
_+1 [longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=361)_, robes, _Fiendish Hypotheses and Protections from Same_ ([spellbook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2753))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 100

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longspear_ +17 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+9 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 bludgeoning

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 25, attack +17
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Caustic Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1461), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (×2), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Environmental Endurance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1517), [Laughing Fit](/Spells.aspx?ID=1583), [See the Unseen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663)
- **3rd**
[Acid Grip](/Spells.aspx?ID=1436), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Grease](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **4th**
[Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [Dispelling Globe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1494), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362)

**Breach the Outer Rifts** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Requirements** The demonologist's last action was to cast a non-[cantrip](/Traits.aspx?ID=550) spell; **Effect** The demonologist siphons energy drawn from the [Outer Rifts](/Planes.aspx?ID=45) into their weapon. Until the end of the turn, the weapon deals an extra 2d6 damage. Roll 1d20 to determine the type: 1–7 acid, 8–9 cold, 10–11 electricity, 12–18 fire, 19–20 void.

**Demon Summoning**   The demonologist can cast a 5th-rank [_summon fiend_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1701) arcane spell to summon a demon. To do so, they must sacrifice two 4th-rank prepared spells and voluntarily take 4d12 mental damage that can't be reduced or prevented. If the demonologist is unable to Sustain the Spell, including if they're knocked out or killed, the spell continues, but the GM rolls a DC 10 flat check each round, ending the spell on a failure.

</column>
